exit_dialog.title: To save or not to save?
exit_dialog.description: If you want to save the game you have the option to do that on our server or locally (this will download a '.mld' file). If you do not want to keep your game state just hit 'exit' :)

tooltips.save_remote: Save your game state on the server
tooltips.exit: All unsaved data will be lost

load_dialog.title: Load saved game
load_dialog.description: If you want to load your game you have the option to do that from our server or from a local '.mld' file. :)

tooltips.load_remote: Select one of your remotely stored game states

moves.request: Your opponent requested {request}. Accept or deny?

waiting_for_opponent.description: Copy the url below and send it to a friend to play with them! :)
waiting_for_opponent.leave: Your friends abandoned you? Stop waiting now!

waiting_for_response: Wait until your opponent accepts your request.

warning.not_your_turn: It's not your turn to play, be patient :)
warning.undo_on_killstreak: Finish your kill streak before requesting an undo!

info.dlc: This feature is only available with the DLC. Consider buying it if you want to use it.
